sqlMap.select: /* selectPurOrdList_NOPAGING */ SELECT TOP $topCnt$ po.cust_po_no ,po.po_sys_no ,po.cust_trdp_cd ,po.cust_trdp_nm ,po.buyr_trdp_cd ,po.buyr_trdp_nm ,po.vndr_trdp_cd ,po.vndr_trdp_nm ,cdt.cd_nm AS ord_sts_cd ,po.org_loc_cd ,po.org_loc_nm ,po.dest_loc_cd ,po.dest_loc_nm ,po.ord_dt ,po.arr_dt ,po.shpwin_fr_dt ,po.shpwin_to_dt ,po.cgo_rdy_dt ,case when po.air_sea_clss_cd = 'S' then 'Ocean' when po.air_sea_clss_cd = 'A' then 'Air' else '' end air_sea_clss_cd FROM tb_po po with(nolock) LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_com_cd_dtl cdt ON po.ord_sts_cd = cdt.cd_val AND cdt.com_cd = 'C129' AND cdt.delt_flg = 'N' WHERE po.delt_flg = 'N'

/* selectPurOrdList */ SELECT a1.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY po.MODI_TMS DESC) as ROWNUM, po.cust_po_no ,po.po_sys_no ,po.cust_trdp_cd ,po.cust_trdp_nm ,po.buyr_trdp_cd ,po.buyr_trdp_nm ,po.vndr_trdp_cd ,po.vndr_trdp_nm ,cdt.cd_nm AS ord_sts_cd ,po.org_loc_cd ,po.org_loc_nm ,po.dest_loc_cd ,po.dest_loc_nm ,po.ord_dt ,po.arr_dt ,po.shpwin_fr_dt ,po.shpwin_to_dt ,po.cgo_rdy_dt ,case when po.air_sea_clss_cd = 'S' then 'Ocean' when po.air_sea_clss_cd = 'A' then 'Air' else '' end air_sea_clss_cd FROM tb_po po LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_com_cd_dtl cdt ON po.ord_sts_cd = cdt.cd_val AND cdt.com_cd = 'C129' AND cdt.delt_flg = 'N' WHERE po.delt_flg = 'N'
AND po.ord_dt BETWEEN #ord_strdt# AND #ord_enddt#
AND po.arr_dt BETWEEN #arr_strdt# AND #arr_enddt#
AND po.cgo_rdy_dt BETWEEN #cgo_rdy_strdt# AND #cgo_rdy_enddt#
AND (po.shpwin_fr_dt <= #shpwin_enddt# AND po.shpwin_to_dt >= #shpwin_strdt#)
po.cust_po_no LIKE #cust_po_no#+'%'
po.po_sys_no LIKE #po_sys_no#+'%'
exists (select 1 from tb_po_cmdt cmdt join TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM itm on cmdt.ctrt_no = itm.ctrt_no and cmdt.item_sys_no = itm.item_sys_no and cmdt.cust_itm_id = itm.ITEM_CD and itm.ITEM_USE_FLG = 'Y' where po.po_sys_no = cmdt.po_sys_no and cmdt.delt_flg = 'N' and itm.ITEM_NM like '%'+#item_desc#+'%')
po.ctrt_no LIKE #ctrt_no#+'%'
po.ord_sts_cd = #ord_sts_cd#
po.air_sea_clss_cd = #air_sea_clss_cd#
po.cust_trdp_cd = #cust_trdp_cd#
po.cust_trdp_nm LIKE #cust_trdp_nm#+'%'
po.buyr_trdp_cd = #buyr_trdp_cd#
po.buyr_trdp_nm LIKE #buyr_trdp_nm#+'%'
po.vndr_trdp_cd = #vndr_trdp_cd#
po.vndr_trdp_nm LIKE #vndr_trdp_nm#+'%'
po.org_loc_cd = #org_loc_cd#
po.org_loc_nm LIKE #org_loc_nm#+'%'
po.dest_loc_cd = #dest_loc_cd#
po.dest_loc_nm LIKE #dest_loc_nm#+'%'
) a1 where a1.ROWNUM > #beginIdx# AND a1.ROWNUM <= #topCnt#

po.cust_po_no LIKE #cust_po_no#+'%'
po.po_sys_no LIKE #po_sys_no#+'%'
exists (select 1 from tb_po_cmdt cmdt join TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM itm on cmdt.ctrt_no = itm.ctrt_no and cmdt.item_sys_no = itm.item_sys_no and cmdt.cust_itm_id = itm.ITEM_CD and itm.ITEM_USE_FLG = 'Y' where po.po_sys_no = cmdt.po_sys_no and cmdt.delt_flg = 'N' and itm.item_nm like '%'+#item_desc#+'%')

po.vndr_trdp_cd = #vndr_trdp_cd#
po.vndr_trdp_nm LIKE #vndr_trdp_nm#+'%'

SELECT ITM.PO_CMDT_SEQ ,ITM.PO_SYS_NO ,ITM.CTRT_NO ,ITM.ITEM_SYS_NO ,ITM.CUST_ITM_ID ,(SELECT ITEM_NM FROM TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM WHM WHERE WHM.CTRT_NO = ITM.CTRT_NO AND WHM.ITEM_SYS_NO = ITM.ITEM_SYS_NO AND WHM.ITEM_CD = ITM.CUST_ITM_ID AND ITEM_USE_FLG = 'Y') AS CUST_ITM_NM ,ITM.PCK_UT_CD ,ITM.PCK_UT_NM ,ITM.PCK_INR_QTY ,ITM.PCK_QTY ,ITM.PCK_QTY - ISNULL(BKG.BK_PCK_QTY,0) AS RMN_PCK_QTY ,ITM.EA_CNT ,ITM.EA_CNT - ISNULL(BKG.BK_EA_CNT,0) AS RMN_EA_CNT ,ITM.TTL_QTY ,ITM.TTL_QTY - ISNULL(BKG.BK_TTL_QTY,0) AS RMN_TTL_QTY ,ITM.CMDT_RMK ,ITM.CMDT_KGS_WGT ,ITM.CMDT_LBS_WGT ,ITM.CMDT_CBM_MEAS ,ITM.CMDT_CFT_MEAS ,ITM.RGST_USRID ,ITM.RGST_OFC_CD ,ITM.RGST_TMS ,ITM.MODI_USRID ,ITM.MODI_OFC_CD ,ITM.MODI_TMS ,ITM.DELT_FLG FROM TB_PO_CMDT ITM LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT ITM.PO_CMDT_SEQ, SUM(ITM.PCK_QTY) AS BK_PCK_QTY, SUM(ITM.EA_CNT) AS BK_EA_CNT, SUM(ITM.TTL_QTY) AS BK_TTL_QTY FROM TB_BKG_PO ITM WHERE ITM.PO_SYS_NO = #po_sys_no# AND ITM.DELT_FLG = 'N' GROUP BY ITM.PO_CMDT_SEQ ) BKG ON ITM.PO_CMDT_SEQ = BKG.PO_CMDT_SEQ WHERE ITM.DELT_FLG = 'N' AND ITM.PO_SYS_NO = #po_sys_no#
